nodes.text: Cell block AA-23 was a detention cell controlled by the Galactic Empire on Lothal. Fruit merchant Yoffar was nearly arrested for treason by two Imperial officers Cumberlayne Aresko and Myles Grint and was determined to be dispatched to cell block AA-23. But by the help of street urchin Ezra Bridger, he was saved and thanked him by giving one of his jogan fruits, although Bridger took more from his basket.

Cell block AA-23 was first mentioned in Star Wars Rebels: Spark of Rebellion, a one-hour television movie that serves as the premiere for the animated television series Star Wars Rebels. The name of this cell block is most likely to be an homage to Detention Block AA-23 from Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.
